title: koluvuDi bhathi
sahitya:
koluvuDi bhakti koNDala kOneTTi nilayuni shrInidhiyaina vAni

caraNam 1

Adi dEvuni hEmavuni sAmavEda nAda vinOduni
telavAri jitapriyu nirmala tatva vAdula jIvanamaina vAni

caraNam 2

dEva dEvuDaina divyuni sthava bhAva tIrtha svabhAvuni
shrI vEnkaTagiri dEvuDaina paradEvuni bhUdEva satparuni
